name: Production and Design II: Design
description: A practical introduction to aspects of theatre production, with a module on scenic design. Working extensively in the Helen Gardiner Phelan Playhouse, the students form the core of the production team for Drama productions. Application Deadline is April 10th; see department website for details.
department: Centre for Drama, Theatre and Performance Studies
prerequisites: DRM100Y1/DRM101Y1/UNI102Y1, Minimum CGPA of 2.7 or permission of the Drama Centre. See online application for details.
